entry.title: Book review - Slack by Tom DeMarco
entry.summary: Organizations are effective only to the extent that all their workers are totally and eternally busy. Written by Tom DeMarco more than 20 years ago, this book fights again this idea. Companies need workers with "slack", with gaps of freedom in their they by day. These gaps will allow your company to change, improve, reinvent and grow.
